      • getActiveConnectionType

        public static int getActiveConnectionType(Context context)
                                   throws DataNotAvailableException
        Reports the type of network to which the info in this NetworkInfo pertains.
        Returns:
        one of ConnectivityManager#TYPE_MOBILE, ConnectivityManager#TYPE_WIFI, ConnectivityManager#TYPE_WIMAX, ConnectivityManager#TYPE_ETHERNET, ConnectivityManager#TYPE_BLUETOOTH, or other types defined by ConnectivityManager
        Throws:
        DataNotAvailableException
